panels.description: Spikes on this graph that are missing from the LAN graph indicate gateway-originated traffic, like a scheduled speed test. Rx is on the negative axis.
panels.title: WAN Throughput

panels.description: DNS Queries Per Minute - By Top Sources

targets.expr:
sort_desc(
  label_replace(
    label_replace(
      label_replace(
        label_replace(
          increase(pihole_top_sources{source!="127.0.0.1", source!="<DEVICE_IP_1>"}[1m]),
          "source",
          "<DEVICE_NAME_1>",
          "source",
          "<DEVICE_IP_2>"
        ),
        "source",
        "<DEVICE_NAME_2>",
        "source",
        "<DEVICE_IP_3>"
      ),
      "source",
      "<DEVICE_NAME_3>",
      "source",
      "<DEVICE_IP_4>"
    ),
    "source",
    "<DEVICE_NAME_4>",
    "source",
    "<DEVICE_IP_5>"
  )
)

panels.title: DNS Queries Per Minute - By Top Sources
